Text:
I have searched high and low for this for a long time.
Many Many Thanks.

This video and many more excellent files are available at private tracker site http://TheBox.bz and are usually very well seeded. They specialize in programs which have been broadcast in the UK at some time. They DO enforce sharing, so if you go there, start out with a few gig of their FREE torrents, which do not count against your Share Ratio.
